"Rampaging Malice":
"This is an emergency message to all ARKS.
We have located the elusive berserk dragon.
It is in the Skyscape of planet Amduscia.
All ARKS are to deploy and repel the
berserk dragon.
We have detected numerous Darker
readings in the mission area. Be careful.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires,
be defeated in the final area."
